item.description:
Please join us for a presentation by Christy Hemenway of Gold Star Honeybees of Bath on "How and Why to Keep Bees in Top Bar Beehives." As Christy points out "Itâ€™s about the BEES!!! Honeybees are showing serious signs of distress from the beekeeping practices of the last century. They are suffering from Colony Collapse Disorder, varroa mite infestation, and other problems that they can no longer fend off successfully due to their abused immune systems."

Come find out how we humans can help. A demonstration top bar beehive will be shown.

6:30 Social Time - Bring a beverage or appetizer to share + dish/cup/utensils
7:00 Presentation followed by questions/discussion

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Top Bar Beekeeping with Christy Hemenway
